long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:  
Save your favorite web pages, articles, and videos for later viewing with the Read Later browser extension! Perfect for commuters, researchers, and anyone who wants access to content even without an internet connection. Stay organized, stay productive, and access your saved content anytime, anywhere.  

Key Features:
- Offline Access: Save full web pages to view without internet.  
- Automatic Sync: Keep your saved content updated across multiple devices.  
- Organize Your Content: Use folders and categories to organize your saved pages for easy retrieval.  
- Update Saved Pages: Already saved a page? Sync its latest version without duplicates.  
- Bulk Delete: Clean up your saved content effortlessly with a single click.  
- User-Friendly Interface: A simple and intuitive design for all users.  

Why Choose Read Later?
- Never lose access to essential information during internet outages or on the go.  
- Effortlessly manage and update your saved pages without cluttering your browser bookmarks.  
- Save time and energy with advanced organization and bulk actions.  

Use Cases:  
- Commuters: Download content and enjoy uninterrupted reading or watching during your commute.  
- Students & Researchers: Organize articles and research material offline for anytime access.  
- Content Enthusiasts: Never lose track of your favorite reads or resources.  

Take control of your web experience with Read Later!    

Update Frequency: Regularly improved with new features based on user feedback.  

Download now and make your browsing experience more efficient and accessible!

Note: We do not collect user data. Permission like download, activeTabs and storage are needed for smooth functioning of the extension.
